actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. With written report No. 103-49.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 72.

official_title: An original bill authorizing appropriations for the Federal Election Commission for fiscal year 1994.
popular_title: Authorization bill FY94, Federal Election Commission

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to authorize appropriations for the Federal Election Commission.

titles.title: Authorization bill FY94, Federal Election Commission
Federal Election Commission FY94 Authorization bill
An original bill authorizing appropriations for the Federal Election Commission for fiscal year 1994.
